languages.text: "О золото Трона, сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец благословил{mf||а} меня в моем порыве! Отныне я уверен, что избрал верный путь!"

traits.locale_text: "О золото Трона, сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец благословил{mf||а} меня в моем порыве! Отныне я уверен, что избрал верный путь!"

languages.text: "O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"
languages.original_text: "О золото Трона, сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец благословил{mf||а} меня в моем порыве! Отныне я уверен, что избрал верный путь!"

traits.locale_text: "O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"
"O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"
"O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"
"O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"

languages.text: “噢，伟大的黄金王座！行商浪人亲自赐予了我{mf|他|她}的祝福！现在我确信，我选择了正确的道路！”
languages.original_text: "O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，伟大的黄金王座！行商浪人亲自赐予了我{mf|他|她}的祝福！现在我确信，我选择了正确的道路！”

languages.text: «¡Oh, por el oro del Trono, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en persona ha dado su bendición a mi impulso! ¡Ahora sé que he elegido el camino correcto!».
languages.original_text: "O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, por el oro del Trono, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en persona ha dado su bendición a mi impulso! ¡Ahora sé que he elegido el camino correcto!».

languages.text: 「黄金の玉座が、自由開拓者ご自身が直々に私の衝動を祝福してくださるなんて！この道は正しいと確信しました！」
languages.original_text: "O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"

traits.locale_text: 「黄金の玉座が、自由開拓者ご自身が直々に私の衝動を祝福してくださるなんて！この道は正しいと確信しました！」

languages.text: "O gold'ner Thron, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} selbst hat meinem Impuls {mf|seinen|ihren} Segen gegeben! Jetzt bin ich sicher, dass ich den richtigen Pfad gewählt habe!"
languages.original_text: "O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"

traits.locale_text: "O gold'ner Thron, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} selbst hat meinem Impuls {mf|seinen|ihren} Segen gegeben! Jetzt bin ich sicher, dass ich den richtigen Pfad gewählt habe!"

languages.text: « Par le Trône d'Or, {mf|le libre-marchand lui-même|la libre-marchande elle-même} a donné sa bénédiction à ma décision ! Je suis maintenant certain d'avoir choisi la bonne voie ! »
languages.original_text: "O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône d'Or, {mf|le libre-marchand lui-même|la libre-marchande elle-même} a donné sa bénédiction à ma décision ! Je suis maintenant certain d'avoir choisi la bonne voie ! »

languages.text: "Ey Taht'ın altını, dileklerimden bizzat Hür Tacir razı oldu! Doğru yolu seçtiğime eminim artık!"
languages.original_text: "O Throne's gold, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} has given {mf|his|her} blessing to my impulse! Now I am sure I have chosen the right path!"

traits.locale_text: "Ey Taht'ın altını, dileklerimden bizzat Hür Tacir razı oldu! Doğru yolu seçtiğime eminim artık!"
